short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have fun taking and sharing photos with over 20 different filters, effects and washes. Share to Facebook, Instagram & Twitter!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your webcam fun to the next level with our virtual online camera app. You can make funny photos using an assortment of effects, filters and washes to share locally or on your favorite social network. 

**Works Offline
**Tons of effects
**Tons of filters
**Save locally anytime
**No logins required

Take your next retro, vintage, instagram, peace sign or duck-face selfie photo right now with our APP!
